verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) Behold, <S%H2009><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Who serve <S%H5975><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord! <S%H3068><s%>
Lift <S%H5375><s%> up your hands <S%H3027><s%> to the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> And bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
May the Lord <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> you from Zion, <S%H6726><s%> He who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth. <S%H776><s%>
